Text:
download speed 1.5mb/ps thx guys for seeding 

for problem with full screen go to C:UserssebDocumentsMy GamesSkyrim
then open "SkyrimPrefs" 
find "iSize H" then type after "H = " 1024
then type in "iSize W" after the "W =" 760
H = horizontal
W = vertical
you can also type your own screen resolution
